targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__range]))

sum(count_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | level="error" | context=~"$context" | method=~"$method" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__range]))

sum(count_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | level="warn" | context=~"$context" | method=~"$method" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__range]))

count(count by(ip) (count_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__range])))

sum(rate({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by(level) (rate({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by(method) (rate({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | method!="" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by(context) (rate({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__interval]))

topk(10, sum by(url) (count_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | url!="" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__range])))

topk(10, sum by(ip) (count_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__range])))

topk(10, sum by(tag) (count_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | tag!="" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__range])))

topk(10, avg by(url) (avg_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | url!="" | duration > 0 |~ "$search" | __error__="" | unwrap duration [$__range])))

sum by(url) (count_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | url!="" | duration > 0 |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__range]))

topk(5, sum by(url) (rate({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | url!="" |~ "$search" | __error__="" [$__interval])))

quantile_over_time(0.5, {job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | duration > 0 |~ "$search" | __error__="" | unwrap duration [5m]) by ()

quantile_over_time(0.95, {job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | duration > 0 |~ "$search" | __error__="" | unwrap duration [5m]) by ()

avg_over_time({job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | duration > 0 |~ "$search" | __error__="" | unwrap duration [5m])

{job="app-ct-backend", service=~"$service", environment=~"$environment", channel="", hostname=""} | json | context=~"$context" | level=~"$level" | method=~"$method" | duration > 500 |~ "$search" | __error__="" | line_format "[{{.method}}] {{.url}} - {{.duration}}ms | Status: {{.statusCode}} | IP: {{.ip}}"
